title: HELP! I cant change my camera scroll back to left click
body:
I tried to change my attack move to left click but now I cant revert my controls. I have already tried resetting to default but it does not revert my camera.
My camera move is set to mouse 3.

replies.body:
We don't support modifications like this because it can cause weird issues like the ones you're experiencing.  Your best bet here would be manually reset your configuration for the fix:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
